metadata.original_prompt: Add loading indicators to Automation Suggestions page (http://localhost:3001/) to show when API calls are in progress. The page currently has loading state variables but no visible indicators. Follow 2025 best practices for loading states: skeleton loaders for initial load, spinners for button actions, and progress indicators for long-running operations. Ensure all API calls (loadSuggestions, refreshSuggestions, generateSampleSuggestion, loadRefreshStatus, loadAnalysisStatus) show appropriate loading feedback.
